alert.note: Alert for Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 10:20PM EST until February 08 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and light freezing rain. Storm total snowfall of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central New Hampshire and south central, southwest and western Maine. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow consistency will be heavy and wet, before changing to rain. Rain falling on untreated, cold surfaces may create slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
